column5: Took a musky hunting buddy out on Lady 'O' this morning.  It was a great day for a boat ride  Here is a pic of the sunrise.    Had a couple of knock-offs from spoons on the riggers. Then hit this one on a Spindoctor and fly from the core.    Ran to the fence to check out if the action had started yet, but not takers.  On a separate note, been busy doing a bunch of things to make the small vessel fish bigger.  Starting to impersonate a Salmon boat...      Still a couple more add-ons to come though.  Bring on the derby!!!  :-)
Great Report. I have almost the same boat! What H.P is that? A 90? I'm afraid to venture to far out in Lake O with my 40 H.P.
Nice fish it was a beautiful morning out there boat looks good you just gave me a few ideas  Rob
It is the F-90, it is a great motor. No problem heading out on the Lake with your 40, check the weather (and wind) forecasts before heading out and when in doubt, fish skinny.  :-)
Nice fish Tundra'n. Thought maybe you gave up fishing, hadn't seen any reports for a while .
Nice fish, but better, I like your Handle...Name!   That would be a good name for a boat.
